remarks: A group element's inverse is a group element.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Oct-2006.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
grpinvcl.1 $e |- X = ran G $.
grpinvcl.2 $e |- N = ( inv ` G ) $.
grpoinvcl $p |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> ( N ` A ) e. X ) $.
